ValidationRule.description: PL Status cannot be set to Complete If Opportunity Stage is not past stage 6.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(OR( CONTAINS("7 Verbal Agreement",Opportunity_Stage__c), CONTAINS("8 Closed Won",Opportunity_Stage__c), CONTAINS("9 Closed Lost",Opportunity_Stage__c), CONTAINS("10 No Opportunity",Opportunity_Stage__c) )),
ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "(9) Complete"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Pursuit Lead Cannot be completed until Opportunity Stage is beyond Verbal Agreement (stage 7).
